page.title: 18EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The area of Roundhay is predominantly middle class with a large section of the populace holding skilled, managerial or professional positions. The occupations are diverse from surveyor, accountant, teacher journalist to well known television personality Jimmy Savile who has his home base in the vicinity of Roundhay Park. Many of the wives resume work once their children attend school, and a greater proportion of these hold positions of equal status to their husbands. There are numerous businesses run from home, some combined husband & wife projects, others by the wife alone, such as soft toy making and designer knitwear. Across at Whinmoor the occupations for the males are mostly those of skilled tradesmen and manual workers.
